channel.title: CVE Feed for 1E -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for 1E -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-7211|2024-08-01T17:33:36.133Z -- 1e -- 1e%20platform
item.description: The Identity Server used by 1E Platform could enable URL redirection to untrusted sites. Note: The Identity Server on 1E Platform has been updated with the necessary patch.

item.title: CVE-2024-7211|2024-08-01T16:49:47.597Z -- 1e -- 1e%20platform
item.description:
The Identity Server used by 1E Platform could enable URL redirection to untrusted sites.
Note: The Identity Server on 1E Platform has been updated with the necessary patch.
